about.title: Who we are?
about.description: At MABASA, we specialize in providing comprehensive solutions in automation, design, machining, welding, and engineering projects. Our commitment is to deliver high-quality services that meet the specific needs of our clients in various industrial sectors.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: We offer innovative solutions tailored to the needs and budget of our clients, with personalized and timely attention.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: We aim to be the best alternative for companies to integrate into the future through our solutions, always distinguished by the quality and professionalism in each of our services.

qualityPolicy.title: Quality Policy
qualityPolicy.description: Deliver a quality service by meeting customer requirements and offering innovative solutions. Develop our engineers through specialized training, leadership, and commitment.

googleMap.openingHours: Customer service hours from 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
googleMap.address: Correo Mayor #1493-3. Postal Cerritos Neighborhood, Saltillo, Coahuila, Mexico
